1.title: It: Chapter One, American Assassin & Mother!
1.plot: Today's topics include IT, American Assassin, Mother!, Gravity Falls, Star Wars, The DCEU and Our Favorite Films of 2017.. so far.

2.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle & Battle of The Sexes
2.plot: Today's topics include Kingsman: The Golden Circle, Battle of the Sexes, The LEGO Ninjago Movie, Stronger, The Untitled Han Solo Film, Tim Miller's Terminator film, the Jumanji sequel and we preview the films coming out next month.

3.title: American Made, Flatliners, Gerald's Game & Best F(r)iends
3.plot: Today's reviews include American Made, Flatliners, Gerald's Game, Best F(r)iends, we debut a new segment and discuss our favorite horror films of all time.

4.title: Blade Runner 2049 & The Mountain Between Us
4.plot: Today's reviews include Blade Runner 2049, The Mountain Between Us, My Little Pony: The Movie, Victoria and Abdul and Marshall. We also recap the past week of television.

5.title: Happy Death Day & The Foreigner
5.plot: Today's reviews include Happy Death Day and The Foreigner. We also recap the past week of television.

6.title: Geostorm, The Snowman & Leatherface
6.plot: Today's reviews include Geostorm, The Snowman, Leatherface and Only The Brave. We also recap the past week of television.

7.title: HALLOWEEN EXTRAVAGANZA & Thor Ragnarok SPOILER Discussion
7.plot: Today's reviews include The Saw Franchise, Jigsaw, Thor Ragnarok and Suburbicon. We also breakdown our Top 10 Halloween movies, debut a BRAND NEW SEGMENT called What If?- and discuss some of the Horror films being released next year.

8.title: Murder On the Orient Express & Daddy's Home 2
8.plot: We discuss Murder on the Orient Express, Daddy's Home 2 (Sort of..) and A Bad Mom's Christmas. We return with Raul's segment as he recaps the last week of television and go through some recent movie news.

9.title: Justice League SPOILER Discussion
9.plot: Today's reviews include a SPOILER DISCUSSION of Justice League, with special guest Billy Pollihan. We also return with Raul's segment as he recaps the last week of television.

10.title: Coco, Call Me By Your Name & Lady Bird
10.plot: Today's reviews include Coco, Call Me By Your Name, Lady Bird, Jim and Andy, Ingrid Goes West, Good Time, Creep 1 and 2, Brigsby Bear, Valerian and Logan Lucky.

11.title: The Disaster Artist + Special Q&A
11.plot: This week we got personal and intimate to discuss The Room, Disaster Artist and Roman J. Israel, Esq.

12.title: Special Interview with Jay Washington
12.plot: We welcome the incredible Jay Washington to talk everything from Wrestling-to his Stand-up, to the Movie Trivia Schmoedown.

13.title: Fanboys, STAR WARS 1-7 + The Last Jedi SPOILER Discussion
13.plot: This week we discuss STAR WARS!. We review Fanboys, Episode 1-3, Rogue One, Episodes 4-7 and The Last Jedi, The Shape of Water, I Tonya, 3 Billboards Outside Ebbing Missouri, The Circle and The Dark Tower.

15.title: Den of Thieves, The Commuter & Phantom Thread
15.plot: Today's reviews include, Den of Thieves, Phantom Thread, The Commuter, The Insidious franchise + The Last Key, Mom and Dad, Jungle, The Greatest Showman, Darkest Hour, A Ghost Story, Wind River, Lady Bird and Paddington 2.

16.title: Maze Runner: The Death Cure SPOILER Discussion
16.plot: On today's show we discuss The Maze Runner franchise + THE DEATH CURSE, Forever My Girl, The Post, Proud Mary, mother!, The Wrestler, Requiem for A Dream, The Darkness, Tragedy Girls, Victor Crowley and A Futile and Stupid Gesture.

17.title: Super Bowl 2018 Trailer RECAP
17.plot: On today's show we discuss the Super Bowl trailers and welcome SPECIAL GUEST BRANDON HANNA.

18.title: Fifty Shades Freed, Peter Rabbit & Cloverfield Paradox
18.plot: On today's show we review 50 Shades Freed, Peter Rabbit, The Ritual, Cloverfield Paradox, Hellraiser Judgement, My Friend Dahmer, Midnight Special, Moon and Horrible Bosses 1+2 !.

19.title: Black Panther SPOILER Discussion
19.plot: On today's show we discuss BLACK PANTHER!. Join us during our spoiler review of the film!. We also talk about Early Man, Tragedy Girls, Hostel, The Guest, Nightcrawler, The Visit, The Incredibles 2 trailer, and MUCH MUCH more!!.

20.title: Annihilation, Mute & STREAMING v STUDIOS Debate
20.plot: Today's episode we discuss Annihilation, Game Night, Duncan Jone's Mute and debate about Netflix, Paramount, distribution and the future of cinema. Raul also reviews Doctor Who and Supernatural during his segment Recaps and Rants.

21.title: 90th Oscars 2018 RECAP
21.plot: LET'S TALK ABOUT THE OSCARS!!. Troy and Raul discuss Jimmy Kimmel, The Winners, The Losers, The Snubbed. Then they shift gears and review Death Wish, Red Sparrow, Annihilation and Game Night !.

22.title: A Wrinkle in Time/Thoroughbreds/Gringo & The Strangers 2
22.plot: Welcome to the 22nd episode of The Monday Show. A weekly discussion breaking down the movies and television you can catch this week. Raul takes over and geeks out about A Wrinkle in Time, Thoroughbreds, Gringo and The Strangers Prey at Night. Troy reacts to the NEW Sorry to Bother You trailer and they both discuss Tomb Raider, Love Simon, Kristen Wig as Cheetah and much much more.

23.title: Tomb Raider & Love, Simon
23.plot: Today Troy and Raul discuss Tomb Raider, Love Simon, Hurricane Heist, The Strangers Prey At Night, Thoroughbreds, From Dusk Till Dawn, A Wrinkle In Time, Big Fat Liar and The Book of Life.

imdb.title: The Monday Show
plot: A weekly discussion breaking down movies and television hosted by Troy Everett Loxton and Raul Rodriguez.
